column5: kids took dad out over the weekend to  supposedely let me fish for a change,hahahah but they ended up steeling the rods again. We had a good weekend with a lot of salmon in the mid 20`s and Junior landed his personal best of 28.64 #    cheers  Ian
Great report! Congrats on junior's personal best. She's a beauty! Thanks for sharing.
Wow!!! Great looking fish!  Congrats to your son on that beauty PB!
wow loooks AWESOME  thats a PIGgggg
